lender.loan_because: A small loan can be a stepping stone to a better quality of life.

lender.name: The Harris Family
lender.loan_because: We believe that hard-working people deserve a chance to build a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I are research scientists who study brain injury and brain development.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: This is an easy way to impact the world and to show the love of Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I do, probably, the same things you do. Clean the house, love the kids, rejoice when my husband comes home.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I've traveled the world and have seen first hand the poverty and hunger that exists. These loans give people and families a chance to move up and out of such conditions.

lender.name: Viking Project
lender.loan_because: we want to understand the power of working and sharing together.
lender.occupational_info: We are a P - 20 district that is committed to building a better world!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It is an interesting way to help another
lender.occupational_info: I perform financial Analysis for current Marketing Programs we have implemented or are going to implement with our Partners.

lender.name: Kellie
lender.loan_because: Originally it was a gift certificate but after seeing Oprah's show about the book: HALF THE SKY, I know I need to help women out all over the world as much as I can.

lender.name: Sherrye
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I visit ill and dying people in the hospital and help them and their families deal with the "new normal" that illness has brought to their lives.

lender.name: victoria
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunity to be self sufficient
lender.occupational_info: I purchase fabrics from a global market to be used to decorate homes...I do adminstrative duties as well...I assist individuals in selection of fabrics for various projects.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Because it is better to enable someone to fish than give them fish.
lender.occupational_info:
I make short films about NGOs and worthy charities whose good works are not well known to others.
(I also do a certain amount of conventional commercial work to support my primary focus.)

lender.name: MGP
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Professional photographer. Travel frequently, am blessed and want to give back.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I want to help globally.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching 10 year olds is enriching, challenging, inspirational, and exhausting!

lender.name: wiliam
lender.occupation: retired teacher and insurance and annuity agent

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Lending allows me to contribute and make a difference for people globally. I do this with love, in memory of my people Lynda, Zee, Fred, Noreen, Cathy. Johnny, Pauline
lender.occupational_info: I embellish and transform photograph's of cherrished memories of children, pets, homes and much more in to watercolor PhotoPaintings.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to help people help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the credit card industry. My company reduces the cost of accepting credit for our customers.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I am very lucky to have the life that I have and I want to provide meaningful opportunity for others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the development and manufacturing of semiconductor microelectronics.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I support the micro loan concept and recognize a little can go a long way.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We were told to strive for life and all that is good on this planet. If we would be still and listen, we would surely hear the prayer of every need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager of a helpdesk for my company. We help people with their technology problems in person, by email and by phone.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to empower women around the world in order to make this a safer and healthier planet.

lender.name: Hilde
lender.loan_because: David always put others first; me, the girls, his students ....... Now that he is gone, it has become even more important for me to try to help others.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I've seen at first hand the positive impact microcredit can have.
lender.occupational_info: Project Manager

lender.name: Madeleine - Sequim, WA
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the finances for a fundraising foundation for our local hospital.

lender.name: laura
lender.loan_because: its important to be thankful for what you have no matter how little it is and give to those who may never have the same opportunities I have. I feel empowered by giving; and it makes my heart happy.

lender.name: Geography Class HHS
lender.loan_because: We want to learn how to help people in different ways.
lender.occupational_info: We are a high school geography class from Thornton, Colorado USA.

lender.name: Hilda
lender.loan_because: People's stories inspire me and I believe everyone makes a difference. I¬¥ve just finished reading The Soul of Money by Lynne Twist. What I had expected, was to learn more about money; what I had not expected was being profoundly touched by this wise woman. Highly recommended. Visit her Web site at www.soulofmoney.org

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: What better way to 'be the change' than to empower people to help themselves.

lender.name: Suryo
lender.loan_because: I believe that empowering people to help themselves is a fast way to stability and health in a developing country.
lender.occupational_info: BodyTalk System is a comprehensive energy medicine that is safe, effective and fast. IT has a "FAST AID" component that is very useful in health emergencies. I teach this system ALL over the world! Ask me about it. suryo@bodytalkwa.com

lender.name: Mahomed L
lender.loan_because: To help others improve their circumstances through their own initiative.

lender.name: Keegan
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I study earthquakes.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Microfinance intrigues me.
lender.occupational_info: I do all the odd jobs, keep track of projects, and make sure that everyone else on my team can do their job without impediments.

lender.name: Communality
lender.loan_because: We are involved with the work of Kiva because we believe that what they are doing is a wonderful "experiment in truth (to borrow M. Gandhi's phrase)."
lender.occupational_info: Founded in 1998, in Lexington, Kentucky (USA), Communality is a community of faith and action on a journey to try to link the historical Christian faith with the realities of our contemporary society. As a part of the growing "neo-monastic" movement in the US, we try to provide a safe place for people to explore faith that is anchored in long-term commitment to one another and the determination to work for reconciliation amidst the beauty & brokenness within us and the world and world systems around us.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who may be less fortunate live happy and successful lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am the secretary to a bankruptcy attorney.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: This kind of solidarity is essential to the survival of the species!!

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to support those less fortunate... and such a small amount for us means so much for these entrepreneurs in other countries!

lender.name: Joann & Karin
lender.loan_because: We gave this as the gift that keeps on giving on behalf of our Urgent Care Doctors who give so much every day! Merry Christmas!

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: we all need eachother
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital supporting laboring women for the delivery of their babies.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: a debt was paid for me
lender.occupational_info: photos / design / radical love

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in microlending and helping those in need.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Professional who wants to build systems to support Micro Lending.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: Many years ago, when I was young and pregnant, I lived in the back of a car and had to steal for food. I know how it feels to dig yourself out of that hole and become self supporting. I am so blessed and joyful to be able to now help others do the same thing.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the computer data base and all paperwork for a school. I am also a Reiki Master.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: who would not, if they were able ...

lender.name: Jean-Francois
lender.loan_because: I grew up in developing countries and I remember the reality of the daily struggle in less fortunate circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I build web sites.

lender.name: Jerimee
lender.occupational_info: I use web technology to promote compassion and justice.

lender.name: Random Lender
lender.loan_because: I can afford to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Writer

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe that we all can end poverty with little out of our own pocket and that micro lending is the best tool to do it. We can empower people to end their own poverty and become independent.
lender.occupational_info: Business Finance

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I would like entrepreneurs in less advantaged situations to have a chance to make a good life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate broker now, but had been a banker for 33 years. I understand the concept and the success of microlending.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to help (and meet) people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I taught English to minor league baseball players. I am now retired.

lender.name: Arif
lender.loan_because: Best way to help people in need, allow them to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: Develop new kitchen products and concepts

lender.name: Darin
lender.loan_because: If i can help another person, even in a little way, I beleive it makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Many peaple around the world are HIV positive. There are always new drug treatments being formulated and these drugs have to go through a trial period before they are approved for general use. I help in coordinating these trials between the clinic I work for and the drug manufaturer.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Having your own business creates pride and honor and gives people more options in life.

lender.name: Three Generations
lender.loan_because: We've seen over the years the difference our Kiva donations make to people. Sharing what we have to help others is important to us.

lender.name: nicolas
lender.loan_because: This is the best way to get rid of poverty in developing countries. This is the theory of bioeconomy.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: As my pastor says: "Live simply so others my simply live."

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: A friend at work gave me a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas because of my invlovement in missions work. What an awesome gift!

lender.name: Monica S. Flores
lender.loan_because:
Purpose, intention, and connection.
We work to support progressive and environmentally sustainable organizations. Our current focus is supporting organic, holistic, fair trade, and green businesses and groups. We strongly support women in business.
As a principal at 10K Webdesign and a partner at the medical vendor directory company PhysMart, and the luxury artisan e-commerce store 57th & Luxe, I am constantly looking for ways to increase social entrepreneurship in my life and in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info:
I help minority women entrepreneurs focus their efforts by using their websites to make more sales, build their community, and connect with their clients. My interest area is green and sustainable businesses.
http://www.10kwebdesign.com http://www.asuccessfulwoman.com http://www.greenbusinesswomen.com

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It brings the world closer to how I envision it.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I want to help the people of the world achieve the life that they desire to live.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a banker, lending money to people for homes and businesses. However, I can't make the decision myself on who to lend to, this allows me to.

lender.name: Marj & Fred
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others who are not so fortunate. I hope I was able to make a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Bjorn Trygve
lender.loan_because: Maybe I can help somone, and they help someone, and they help... It's worth a try.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: sustainability is important for everyone
lender.occupational_info: I seek to connect people, ideas and resources in order to develop evidence-based solutions to the impact and repercussions of firearm violence and injury.

lender.name: Jaime
lender.occupational_info: I clean teeth for a living

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: My wife and I have been blessed and I hope to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work with an organization that helps Republican candidates run for office. Our mission statement is: Building better communities through service, integrity and results.

lender.name: Kierith
lender.loan_because: "You must be a part of the change you wish to see in the world" -Ghandi

lender.name: Sofia
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed at what they work hard at. I believe in you.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: If we don't take care of one another who will !!!
lender.occupational_info: climb poles and hang wire for phone lines

lender.name: Pat & Darrel
lender.loan_because: Tiny seeds can grow into beautiful things.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have far more than i need.
lender.occupational_info: Educating children using computer software programs that my company develops.

lender.name: Morna
lender.loan_because: I can help someone realize their goals in a lasting way.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company that develops ski mountain resorts. I'm an accountant by training, and am responsible for helping the company realize value from its assets.

lender.name: Chris G
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian.
lender.occupational_info: I help people protect their homes and families from illness, fires and natural disasters.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. I was lucky to be born in the U.S. and given opportunities to succeed. We have a responsibility to help others.

lender.name: Cort & Twila
lender.loan_because: Cort has bad credit because of medical bills--no bank will give me a loan anytime soon. However, I can loan a little bit to others because these are the kind of loans MOST people in the world need. Twila has good credit and came up with the idea of giving Kiva gift certificates to our mothers--or did Kiva have that idea? At any rate, Twila said: let's make the ladies pay!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: People around the world need money more than I do.

lender.name: The Ellison Family
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have a chance to succeed. All a person needs is a chance.

lender.name: Pamelie
lender.loan_because: I support the concept of micro-lending and the empowerment and community building that happens. Its fun to be able to see real faces and stories behind the loans - it makes the world seem so small and present. I also want the world to know that there is a lot more compassion in the U.S. than our foreign policies may indicate. Our country is full of generous, caring people who don't necessarily support the actions of our elected officials.
lender.occupational_info: Support staff for a progressive consulting firm that specializes in grassroots organizing, targeting, and field work.

lender.name: Ann Marie
lender.loan_because: helping others who want to help themselves, truely does inspire me and makes me feel that I can make a small difference
lender.occupational_info: I work with people living with HIV/AIDS. I offer empowerment workshops to women who are HIV positive as well as work in HIV research in women.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am married with two wonderful children. I enjoy music, reading, fencing, and working with metal. I believe that random acts of kindness should be practiced daily.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, and this is the best way for me right now.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Emory University, in Atlanta, Georgia. I also work part-time as an English as a Second Language tutor for international students at Emory. I'm currently considering focusing my studies in Neuroscience and Behavioral Biology, as well as Linguistics with a focus in Spanish and Japanese.

lender.name: Gormello/Fladaking
lender.loan_because: Merry Christmas to Donna, Dad, Dave, Mom, Lee and Alex.

lender.name: Matej
lender.loan_because: Successful business leads to easier life and more time to relax, think and enjoy.
lender.occupational_info: Software sales. IBM. Business value and efficiency.

lender.name: Mitcho Family
lender.loan_because: We are blessed as a family, and we want others in the world to have equal opportunities.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Rob and Sharon
lender.loan_because: Life is very hard for so many. We want to make it easier for a few.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: April Newman
lender.loan_because: I can, and it's a great way to help a neighbor. Kiva enables me to be involved in a personal way, and I want to help enable others to reach their goals. I like microfinance and this model of individual-based lending because they can help persons' economic and social growth even in the face of enormous institutional and systemic obstacles.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: I want to empwer women to be all they can be!
lender.occupational_info: I help women get clear on what they truly want and take the steps to get it, so they can live the lives they were meant to live!

lender.name: Dasarom
lender.loan_because: I beleive the power of "sharing"

lender.name: Melind
lender.loan_because: If not me, then who?

lender.name: Elyn
lender.loan_because: I want to set an example for my three children and show them how investing in other businesses around the world can help with global commerce, making a difference and creating a more connected, stronger world.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a small wholesale manufacturing business.

lender.name: John B
lender.loan_because: The money is not just a handout it's away to help someone become self sufficient and break the poverty cycle
lender.occupational_info: I own a small Arcitectural Metalwork business specializing in stainless steel work.

lender.occupational_info:
It is simple, make a loan, you get it paid back over time, and both sides win.
KAPU

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I am self employed and am financially in a position to help other small business owners.
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects for banks in the United States. My services are required when a bank purchases another bank or when they need to upgrade their computer systems.

lender.name: CDR
lender.loan_because: Hope springs eternal

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I believe hard work should be rewarded.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying at York University to earn a Masters in Fine Arts for Theatre performance. I'm interested in creating new and innovative theatre.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: I love world travel and my contact with world merchants. I once owned a grocery store in a small town.
lender.occupational_info: I organize car races for fun recreation.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: This gift was given to me, so I can give back with love...
lender.occupational_info: To assist my co-workers and the public for the betterment of the community as well as for my employer.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps volunteern in Peru and eager to support individuals and families in this more direct way.

lender.name: Tung
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to be in a position to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work with retailers to build online communities and leverage consumer-generated content.

lender.name: Will
lender.occupational_info: I monitor and measure stream flows and wells, compile and analyze the collected data, and do water quality sampling.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I've had more than my share of good luck.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college professor

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: everyone wants to take care of their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university library.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: My son Tony, in photo, gifted me with a certificate, but now that I've begun I'll continue to give because I believe in sharing with what has been given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I paint and write poems because these keep me in love with the beauty of the world and in touch with my inner landscape.

lender.name: Brenda and Bill
lender.loan_because: We want to help make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Brenda - Nurse Bill - Emergency Management Consultant

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I support the idea of microloans. The barriers that were formerly created by a traditional lending arrangement created a division that kept many bright, beautiful, thoughtful people pigeonholed. I believe that the more you empower people to change their own lives, the better our planet will be.
lender.occupational_info: I work with at-risk youth in my hometown to better understand resilience as a a result of a supportive community network, rather than the work of an individual.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I have a degree in economics and I believe in microloans!!!

lender.name: Gil
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help once in a while! We are fortunate in the USA, and we must share our good fortune with the rest of the world!
lender.occupational_info: I create idea's or business that have a demand and that have not been created yet. We put those ideas into brick & mortar to enable business and living.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I have a desire to to help with little means to do so. This seemed like something I could do very easily.
lender.occupational_info: Terrazzo is a flooring where you mix different colors and sizes of marble chips with an epoxy mix and trowel it down and then grind smooth.I also lay tile on walls and floors.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I saw Kiva introduced on Oprah's show about giving. It touched my heart and I decided to become a Kiva Lender. I love the idea of helping others to help themselves through business.
lender.occupational_info: Carla Clayton guides you through the technical world of internet marketing with easy to understand lessons on setting up Facebook, Blogs, and Websites to market your business. From free advertising to viral marketing, from Facebook, Twitter to blogging ‚Äì Carla can help you move forward with your business.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It is a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: I keep the lights on.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I feel connected to the rest of the world. Fun to see so many people sharing.

lender.name: Dick Terrell
lender.loan_because: everyone should
lender.occupational_info: I drive a school bus for my local district

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: we are one world... it is our responsibility to help others and ensure they have the tools, education, and basics for a better today and to support our world's future generation.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I like to give as God has blessed me with a gift of giving. I look to God to fill my heart with joy as I can see the blessing being handed down to people who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I assist in the administrative duties of a pediatrician's office. It is a rewarding job knowing that I contribute all of my skills and knowledge to ones that are in need. Helping people is a joyful job and being blessed to work with a wonderful group of people.

lender.name: Sidd
lender.loan_because: it is right

lender.name: Shari
lender.loan_because: Balance....humility......prospective....gratitude.....duty

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to promote self-sufficiency, and I enjoy the greater transparency than you get with most charities.

lender.name: King Dog
lender.loan_because: I grew up with limited resources on an Amish farm near Lancaster, PA. With the help of so many friends, I've led a very blessed life.
lender.occupational_info: In my free time, I enjoy long walks (preferrably in the woods), fine dinning and spending time with my sister.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: to share my blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I help people see better by providing eye glasses and contact lenses.

lender.name: Kane
lender.loan_because: Because I want to help kids go to school.

lender.name: The Harrison Family
lender.loan_because: I have been in a position in my life where I could have used financial help, a chance. Give a man a fish, and you will feed him for a day. Lend him the money to buy a net, and he will not only be able to pay you back by selling the fish, but he can feed his family. It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I design technology the way a building architect design a house. I make sure the technology is well built so the house will be easy to live in and will not fall down. My wife does volunteer work at my son's school where he is in second grade.

lender.name: Kris & Kev
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate people to be born into the lives we have. The least we can do is give others a helping hand when we can.

lender.name: Bridget
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping each other is the best part of being human.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the process industry (chemicals, plastics, pharmaceuticals, energy, refining), trying to improve safety and efficiency.

lender.name: Tang
lender.loan_because: It works.
lender.occupational_info: I provide technology training to not-for-profit organizations that work with domestic violence and sexual assault survivors.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship and the goal of economic equity on a global scale.

lender.name: Radha and Srikanth
lender.loan_because: A wonderful opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: We work as a teacher and engineer.

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: Giving and receiving is part of balancing the energy of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I assist in the development of new medication.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can. Everyone should do their part in attempt to restore balance on this earth.

lender.name: Shane
lender.occupational_info: I design electrical equipment and connections for buildings for a major architectural company.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs are the backbone of the economy.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses in Canada get started. We participate in business planning, marketing and strategy.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: It is a small and easy thing to do to help someone else. Plus, it's fun!!

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: I can :)

lender.name: Soren
lender.loan_because: This seems like a model that will actually have an impact.

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers for other people.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference with a small amount of money.

lender.name: Eliza
lender.occupational_info: I am a nursing student.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.occupation: Director, Business Development, Dean Media Group
lender.loan_because: I was given this as a gift...And have made Kiva my first and foremost charity. It is wonderful to be able to actually help people that "need" things. It has truly changed my perspective on the idea of what I "need" and what I "want". Thank you!! This was an excellent gift.
lender.occupational_info: Business Director, Golfers Media Dean Media Group

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: Some people just need a little help.

lender.name: Brian
